text: Gluema is a genus of plant in family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1935.Aubréville, André & Pellegrin, François. 1935. Bulletin de la Société Botanique de France 81: 797Tropicos, Gluema Aubrév. & Pellegr. Gluema is native to tropical western and west-central Africa.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;species # Gluema ivorensis Aubrév. & Pellegr. \- Ivory Coast, Ghana, Cameroon, Gabon # Gluema korupensis Burgt \- Cameroon ==References== Category:Flora of Africa Category:Sapotaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Gluema
